intro.paragraph1: I'm Christian Rodr√≠guez. I'm a software engineer passionate about building things that make life easier for others. When I'm not sitting at my desk, I'm either on my bike or spending time with family.
intro.paragraph2: I write about software engineering, life lessons, and whatever else is worth sharing. Here's some of my latest:

why.paragraph1: I got a Breville Bambino Plus and quickly realized espresso is a rabbit hole. Every variable matters: dose, yield, grind size, temperature, pressure...
why.paragraph2: This app helps me dial in new beans and remember what worked. Plus, it's a fun excuse to build something and ship it publicly.
why.paragraph3: Currently optimizing for chocolatey shots around 1:2-1:2.5 ratio in ~25 seconds.
